title: T204 Milan for Sale or Trade
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T204 Milan for Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Kevin Cummings
I have not been very lucky at the grading game recently. The card below came back as Authentic due to added color. It is otherwise very nice. My loss is your gain as you can pick up a T204 for 1/3 of the Near Mint price.

$160 delivered or will listen to trade offers for Old Judge commons.
